title: Amed Beach Diving & Relaxation (Half-day)
overview: Experience the peaceful fishing village of Amed Beach, known for its black volcanic sand and excellent diving/snorkeling spots.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy diving or snorkeling in the clear waters.
Lunch at a local warung with sea views.

title: Amed Beach & Underwater Adventure (Full-day)
overview: A full day at Amed Beach, featuring diving, snorkeling, and relaxing in a tranquil coastal setting.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy diving, snorkeling, or exploring the village.
Free time for sunbathing, swimming, or exploring the coastline.
